main_definition: Clearly obvious or easily understood; apparent.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily seen or understood; clearly visible, obvious.
meanings_and_examples.example: The wet paint was evident on the wall.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Clearly provable and not open to questioning or doubt; indisputable.
meanings_and_examples.example: The results of the experiment were evident after careful analysis.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Given, understood as self-evident truths that do not require further explanation or proof.
meanings_and_examples.example: It is evident that all humans are equal and deserve respect.
